name: RDB: Root Doot Boot
description:
TV Guy is having some issues with his computer, he cant Boot!
Explore his hard drive, and search for the root cause of his problems! Encounter many strange individuals along the way, and maybe help them out!

Inspired by 90s & Early y2k computing, ENA, and the Webcore Aesthetic as a whole!

Made for Global Game Jam 2023
